name: Google Sheets - Scrolling for Published Books
description: Adds a scrollbar to the worksheets menu for published Google Sheets workbooks with many worksheets.
additional_info:
v0.3 (12/25/2017) - horizontal scrollbar
v0.2 (12/25/2017) - cleans up sheets viewport
v0.1 (12/25/2017) - basic initial version
